summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Milk-Peel Gentle Exfoliating Toner is a gentle exfoliating toner with LHA, a salicylic acid derivative, that refines skin's texture to reveal visibly smoother, softer, and brighter skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis dual-action milk-peel formula visibly refines like a peel and replenishes like a milk.Gentle enough for daily use, this exfoliating toner dissolves impurities while replenishing the skin's moisture levels for visibly smoother, softer, and brighter skin.Key IngredientsLipo-Hydroxy Acid (LHA): Gently dissolves impurities and removes dead skin cells to refine the appearance of skin's texture, like a "peel," for visibly smoother, clearer, and brighter skin23% Emollients and Almond Milk: Replenish the moisture barrier to hydrate, comfort, and soften skinResearch ResultsAfter 7 days, skin was clinically shown to be*:SmootherSofterBrighterIn a clinical and consumer study of 52 women, after 7 days**:90% agreed skin looks more supple*Results based on expert grading in a clinical study of 44 panelists, ages 30 to 50, after 4 weeks of use.**Results based on a 4-week consumer perception study of 52 panelists, ages 30 to 50, having all skin types including 50% of sensitive skin.Item 2617286How To UseSuggested Usage:-Shake well before use.-Twice daily, moisten a cotton pad with this exfoliating toner and gently swipe along a clean and dry face, avoiding eye area.-For optimal results, use toner every morning and night after your cleansing step and before applying a serum.-Pair this lipo-hydroxy acid toner with Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution (sold separately) for a brighter-looking, clearer complexion.IngredientsAqua/Water, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil/Safflower Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Peg-40 Glyceryl Cocoate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Coceth Sulfate, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Tromethamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Nobilis Peel Oil/Mandarin Orange Peel Oil, Adenosine, Limonene, Caprylyl Glycol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf/Nut/Stem Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Seed Extract/Sweet Almond Seed Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Silybum Marianum Extract, Tocopherol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lactic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake well before use.-Twice daily, moisten a cotton pad with this exfoliating toner and gently swipe along a clean and dry face, avoiding eye area.-For optimal results, use toner every morning and night after your cleansing step and before applying a serum.-Pair this lipo-hydroxy acid toner with Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution (sold separately) for a brighter-looking, clearer complexion.
ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil/Safflower Seed Oil
Citrus Nobilis Peel Oil/Mandarin Orange Peel Oil
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Seed Extract/Sweet Almond Seed Extract

reviews.headline: Great toner
reviews.comments: I was surrised how great this toner works. Your skin looks glowy right after the first application. I have sensitige skin and it doesnt irritate me. I would highly recommend this for anyone!

media.headline: Bad Container Design
media.caption: White top was originally glued as part of the silver top. It is broken and sharp.

media.headline: Oo la la
media.caption: Just the acne spot left not the acne thanks God. I'm so happy. I just want to find a good product to help with these spot. Thanks kiehls.

media.headline: Dry and long term spots and sunburn
media.caption: Before and after

media.headline: Unbelievable Product
media.caption: Two months later.  The wrinkles are fewer, the finer wrinkles are gone, and the ones left are shorter and smaller.  My skin is also shinier in general.

media.headline: Unbelievable Product
media.caption: Before using Kiehl's, and this Milk Peel Gentle Exfoliating Toner

faceoff_positive.comments: I never had a real skincare routine - I'm kind of a tomboy, and never even washed my face at night - but my boyfriend (who loves Kiehl's) convinced me to go in and talk with a Kiehl's professional.  I came out with the Midnight Recovery Botanical Cleansing Oil, this Milk Peel Gentle Exfoliating Toner, and the Ultra Facial Cream.  I have been using this routine religiously for two months now, and saw a photo the other day and could not believe the difference.  My skin color has even changed!  I swear the Milk Peel Toner is the main reason - I absolutely love how it feels on my face, and how supple my skin feels immediately after applying it.  I don't wear nearly as much makeup anymore, because I feel so confident with just a fresh face.
faceoff_positive.headline: Unbelievable Product

faceoff_negative.comments: Product is in a cylinder jar that you twist open. Unfortunately the silver top breaks easily, making it hard to open and leaving you exposed to glue that doesn't dry even after 2 weeks and can get mixed in with your product. If it gets mixed in, it burns when applied to face.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bad Container Design
